Ceres: A native iOS 2D game where the user is tasked with collecting as many rare space gems as possible. The app was built as part of a Software Design and Development course at Macalester College in a team of four.
Website: The website you are browsing right now! A responsive window into my world and a portfolio of my work. New features coming soon!
RunColorRun: A collabrative running app where runners are placed into teams and the team that runs over the most area in the twin cities wins. A new game begins each week and teams are randomly shuffled! Currently in closed beta.
